text: Wbeimar Angulo Mosquera (born 6 March 1992), commonly known as Wbeymar, is a professional footballer who currently plays as a midfielder for Gandzasar Kapan. Born in Colombia, he represents the Armenia national team. ==Club career== Wbeymar began his career in Colombia Patriotas, Bogotá, Atlético Huila and Alianza Petrolera. In January 2014, Wbeymar signed with Murciélagos in the Liga Premier de Ascenso. On 31 July 2015, Wbeymar was presented as a new signing for Gandzasar Kapan in the Armenian Premier League. ==International career== On 27 August 2020, Wbeymar was called up to the Armenia national football team for the first time, for their games against North Macedonia and Estonia on 5 and 8 September 2020 in the 2020–21 UEFA Nations League. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="7" valign="center"|Gandzasar Kapan |2015–16 |rowspan="6" valign="center"|Armenian Premier League |21||1||4||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||25||1 |- |2016–17 |29||0||2||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||31||0 |- |2017–18 |26||1||4||0||2||0||colspan="2"|–||32||1 |- |2018–19 |28||1||2||0||2||0||1||0||33||1 |- |2019–20 |18||0||3||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||21||0 |- |2020–21 |2||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||2||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !124!!3!!15!!0!!4!!0!!1!!0!!144!!3 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !124!!3!!15!!0!!4!!0!!1!!0!!144!!3 |} ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
